resources.string: After the death of his father, T\'Challa now prepares to be crowned the new king of Wakanda. \nHowever, T\'Challa finds that his position is now being challenged by the appearance of an old enemy named Killmonger, which puts both Wakanda and the world at risk. \nTeaming with the Dora Milaje, his little sister Shuri, and his CIA ally Everett K. Ross, T\'Challa must harness the powers of the Black Panther to fight his enemy and save Wakanda from destruction.
